channel.title: Need someone to add Tutorial Island for a 317 or tell me how to do it
channel.description: Hello i got a 317 sever and I was wondering how do i add Tutorial Island if anyone is willing to do it for me or make a tut on it plz help thank you

item.title: Need someone to add Tutorial Island for a 317 or tell me how to do it
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

kill boy 98:

i mean some busic stuff like what stuff i neeed to learn

  1. spawning the tutorial island npcs
  2. give them dialogues
  3. make so doors can be opened, and players can go down/up from ladders
  4. Restricting gaining xp above level 3
  5. Restricting teleporting as long the tut isn’t finished
  6. Making that your skills works (fishing, mining, wc tutorial, ect…)
  7. Being able to add stuff into the itemOnItem packet (dough on flour to make bread)
  8. Being able to add stuff into the objectClicking packet (cook fish on fire)
  9. Saving variables so e.g. the player can’t get 20 times the pick axe of the mining instructor.
  10. Optional: adding progressbar and arrows

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone to add Tutorial Island for a 317 or tell me how to do it
